REUTERS.TEXT: CORRECTION - PARIS - FRENCH PUBLIC SECTOR In Sunday's item "French public sector to get five billion francs," the first paragraph of the second take should read 800 mln francs of investment for industrial modernisation and 800 mln for high-tech industries... (correcting from 800,000 francs for each sector) REUTER
